body_html: @devinbostIL Thanks for your test. I can also run this test on my K40 server. The error occurs on the M40 cluster node. I guess it is my build option problem since I install a fresh anaconda and directly install the peterjc123 conda package and it can be deployed on the cluster node.

body: @devinbostIL Thanks for your test. I can also run this test on my K40 server. The error occurs on the M40 cluster node. I guess it is my build option problem since I install a fresh anaconda and directly install the peterjc123 conda package and it can be deployed on the cluster node.
